name: ChatGPT
shortDescription: General-purpose conversational AI for writing, research, and coding assistance.
description: ChatGPT is a conversational AI that assists with writing, ideation, coding help, and more. Great for drafting, brainstorming, and answering questions.

name: Claude
shortDescription: Helpful writing and analysis assistant with long-context strength.
description: Claude is great for thoughtful writing, analysis, and summarization with strong safety alignment and long context windows.

name: Midjourney
shortDescription: Text-to-image generation with a distinct artistic style.
description: Midjourney generates high-quality images from text prompts. Popular among designers and artists for its unique aesthetic.

name: Runway
shortDescription: AI video editing and generation tools for creators.
description: Runway provides AI-powered video editing, background removal, and generative video models suitable for creators and marketers.

name: GitHub Copilot
shortDescription: Pair programmer that autocompletes and suggests code.
description: GitHub Copilot speeds up coding by suggesting functions, tests, and boilerplate directly in your IDE.
